CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 31, 1956, pg. 1, reads: "Thousands Observe 'Prayer Day' Here! - Employes [Employees] Pray - The officials and employes [sic] of the North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company stopped work on Wednesday morning to hold special prayer services for the gallant Montgomery, Ala. bus boycotters. They pledged and paid their one hour's pay, too! - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women and men, employees of North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company, seated with bowed heads, for National Prayer Day honoring Montgomery Alabama bus boycotters
